plot: As bullying at South Park Elementary becomes more severe, the kids take action against it after seeing Butters beaten up, but Butters has a secret about his tormentor.

Butters shows up to school with a black eye and Stan stands up for the anti-bullying cause with a song and dance video featuring Butters as the star. Unable to tell his parents or classmates Butters is forced to try to cope with his problem, which proves harder than expected.—Stan Marsh
